name: Ricotta Breakfast Pancakes
author: BARBARALB
summary: These are quick and easy using a pancake mix as a base or the dry ingredients from your favorite pancake recipe.  They are a nice change from traditional pancakes and a great way to use up leftover ricotta cheese. Serve with maple or fruit syrup.
ingredients: 2 ⅔ cups skim milk, or as needed
directions: Whisk together the pancake mix, skim milk, and ricotta in a bowl until smooth
Batter should be thick; add more milk if necessary to get desired consistency
Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium-high heat
Drop batter by large spoonfuls onto the griddle, and cook until bubbles form and the edges are dry
Flip, and cook until browned on the other side
